name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Yes, a squirrel can be an Idol, too #AyundaRisu3D【Ayunda Risu ⧸ hololive ID 】 [VxnwBm49egM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Risu talks about her cover of 'flos' and introduces her 'Nut Mic'.

subtitles.original: Daphne, Vitis, Salvia...
subtitles.english: Daphne, Vitis, Salvia...

subtitles.original: Cyanus, Lychnis, Abelia...
subtitles.english: Cyanus, Lychnis, Abelia...

subtitles.original: Sedum, Felicia, Ochna...
subtitles.english: Sedum, Felicia, Ochna...

subtitles.original: Lychnis
subtitles.english: Lychnis

subtitles.original: 再会　君の想いは　憂は　巡る感情論は
subtitles.english:
Reunion. Your thoughts, your grief,
the revolving emotional arguments...

subtitles.original: 半径85センチの
subtitles.english: Within this 85-centimeter radius

subtitles.original: 世界に　囚われたまま
subtitles.english: remaining trapped in this world.

subtitles.original: 本音を挿し　微笑（わら）い合った今日
subtitles.english:
Stabbing our true feelings,
smiling at each other today,

subtitles.original: 溢れた色彩に
subtitles.english: amidst the overflowing colors.

subtitles.original: 薪（まき）をくべて風に乗せて
subtitles.english: Stoking the fire, letting it ride the wind,

subtitles.original: 錆びた空を彩る
subtitles.english: coloring the rusted sky.

subtitles.original: 濁った日々を丁寧に
subtitles.english: Carefully tending to these muddy days,

subtitles.original: 飾った花はすぐに枯れていく
subtitles.english:
the flowers I used to decorate them
soon wither away.

subtitles.original: 不遇な僕は夢から醒めて
subtitles.english: Unlucky as I am, I wake from the dream,

subtitles.original: 縋（すが）った意味も無い、ない、ない、ない
subtitles.english:
and there was no meaning in clinging to it,
none at all.

subtitles.original: 君が僕にくれた声も　色も
subtitles.english: The voice you gave me, the colors,

subtitles.original: 揺るぎない愛情も
subtitles.english: and your unwavering affection,

subtitles.original: 二人きりの空に向かった星も
subtitles.english: even the stars we watched in our private sky,

subtitles.original: とうに散ってしまった
subtitles.english: have long since scattered.

subtitles.original: 何時の末（すえ）も　温もりの冷えに
subtitles.english: At the end of time, in the cooling of warmth,

subtitles.original: 季節は色褪せて
subtitles.english: the seasons fade.

subtitles.original: 熱を帯びて身を震わせて
subtitles.english: Gaining heat, body trembling,

subtitles.original: 擦れた街に零れる
subtitles.english: spilling out into the worn-out streets.

subtitles.original: 荒（すさ）んだ日々を丁寧に
subtitles.english: Carefully following these bleak days,

subtitles.original: 辿った先に花が咲くはず
subtitles.english: flowers should bloom at the end of the path.

subtitles.original: 不遇な君は夢を見たまま
subtitles.english: Unlucky as you are, still dreaming,

subtitles.original: 悟った振りで水を注いだ
subtitles.english: you poured water while pretending to understand.

subtitles.original: 木漏れ日の中に　柔らかく咲いた
subtitles.english:
Blooming softly in the sunlight
filtering through trees,

subtitles.original: 花は雲の上で
subtitles.english: the flowers are above the clouds,

subtitles.original: 散った星で夢の先で
subtitles.english: at the scattered stars, beyond the dream,

subtitles.original: 揺れてる
subtitles.english: they are swaying.

subtitles.original: 濁った日々を丁寧に
subtitles.english: Carefully tending to these muddy days,

subtitles.original: 飾った花はすぐに枯れていく
subtitles.english:
the flowers I used to decorate them
soon wither away.

subtitles.original: 不遇な僕は夢から醒めて
subtitles.english: Unlucky as I am, I wake from the dream,

subtitles.original: 縋った意味も無い、ない、ない、ない
subtitles.english:
and there was no meaning in clinging to it,
none at all.

subtitles.original: 不毛な日々を丁寧に
subtitles.english: Carefully on those barren days,

subtitles.original: 綴った紙に花を描いた
subtitles.english: I drew flowers on the paper I wrote on.

subtitles.original: 不遇な僕ら夢に当てられて
subtitles.english: Unlucky as we are, struck by the dream,

subtitles.original: 誓った筈も無かった事にしたい
subtitles.english:
I want to pretend that our oaths
never happened.

subtitles.english: Daphne, Vitis, Iris, Maackia...

subtitles.original: flos
subtitles.english: flos

subtitles.original: Hooa... flos. flos ni, wa wa wa.
subtitles.english: Whoa... flos. flos, wow.

subtitles.original: Ayunda! There's a lot of Ayunda in flos, huh?
subtitles.english: Ayunda! There's a lot of Ayunda in flos, huh?

subtitles.original: Ayunda, can you say hi? Hi!
subtitles.english: Ayunda, can you say hi? Hi!

subtitles.original: (Laughs) Yes, Ayunda came too, you know?
subtitles.english: (Laughs) Yes, Ayunda came too, you know?

subtitles.original: Wah! Wah!
subtitles.english: Wah! Wah!

subtitles.original: flos is my, um, like I've explained to you before really back...
subtitles.english: flos is my, um, like I've explained to you before really back...

subtitles.original: flos was my comfort song. And there's a lot of Ayunda in there...
subtitles.english: flos was my comfort song. And there's a lot of Ayunda in there...

subtitles.original: Because the original cover of my flos is full Risu, right?
subtitles.english: Because the original cover of my flos is full Risu, right?

subtitles.original: So I'm giving you more Ayunda. So so so.
subtitles.english: So I'm giving you more Ayunda. So so so.

subtitles.original: D-D-D-Ayunda in action. Here, you want to see? Oh, before that...
subtitles.english: D-D-D-Ayunda in action. Here, you want to see? Oh, before that...

subtitles.original: I would like to, um... What do you call this? Mic. So so so.
subtitles.english: I would like to, um... What do you call this? Mic. So so so.

subtitles.original: Yes, I want to show you my mic.
subtitles.english: Yes, I want to show you my mic.

subtitles.original: This is the mic that I personally designed since my debut.
subtitles.english: This is the mic that I personally designed since my debut.

subtitles.original: So this is the "Nut Mic". (Laughs)
subtitles.english: So this is the "Nut Mic". (Laughs)

subtitles.original: I sing on your nuts! (Laughs)
subtitles.english: I sing on your nuts! (Laughs)

subtitles.original: So yeah, this is the mic that I, uh...
subtitles.english: So yeah, this is the mic that I, uh...
